metadata.title: CVE-2022-3665 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability classified as critical was found in Axiomatic Bento4.Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the fileAvcInfo.cpp of the component avcinfo. The manipulation leads to heap-basedbuffer overflow. The attack can be launched remotely. The exploit has beendisclosed to the public and may be used. The identifier VDB-212005 wasassigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
